short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to view and rate the political biases of web pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Help fight political bias and fake news!

LeftRight allows you to easily view the political biases of web pages you browse, helping you determine when an article or blog post might be presenting biased information.

You can also help others by easily rating whether you think a web page is Left, Right, or Neutral (no bias). This means that ratings are provided by the community, and not third-party institutions.

We do provide default ratings, sourced from https://mediabiasfactcheck.com/. This is so that users may still view ratings for new or obscure articles that the community might not yet have rated.
